title: Mista Griggins in Space
description: Jerry Skyler’s Mista Griggins is back. This time around the President is sending him to Mars.
quote: This black man is gon’ give that planet a good dusting.
altHero: Mista Griggins, sharply dressed, in front of an electrical panel
alt1: Mista Griggins looks at a topographical map illuminated on glass
alt3: the President smiles smugly in front of the map wall
alt4: Mista Griggins holding a feather duster
